name: places/ChIJWQ_BkEYu6IkR1DnwQceHy64
formattedAddress: 222 E 93rd St Apt 27j, New York, NY 10128, USA
adrFormatAddress: 222 E 93rd St Apt 27j, New York, NY 10128, USA

originalText.text: Absolutely perfect. Chadi has worked with us for over two years from our engagement to the wedding. Behind the camera lenses, craft, and skill is a really passionate artist who genuinely takes pride in giving others a smile. He goes above and beyond for every shot he takes, yet is always staying cool and collected. Along with really top-notch angles, shots, and editing, Chadi is also very approachable and was active with solid communication. Purposeful in his planning, Chadi gave a lot of useful guidance and tips leading up to our events and adapted well to changing circumstances. Chadi was even noticeably punctual (he and his team arrived much earlier than scheduled on the wedding day) and well-dressed for our occasions—fedora and everything! He is kind and soft-spoken, yet these gestures made himself a beloved fixture at our events because they conveyed a lot of class and respect toward us and our guests. He keeps things both organized and fun at the same time. When things got difficult and time-restrained due to outside issues, he kept us going with his positivity and vision. His attitude genuinely impacted us and led to our wedding being the most amazing day of our lives. Chadi is an expert at what he does and, from first impression until now, he has always been a considerate, humble, and personable professional to work with. Thank you, Chadi, for everything. We are eternally thankful for all of your incredible contributions to our blessed union!

originalText.text: From the beginning, Chadi and his team went above and beyond to make sure our wedding day turned out amazing. Chadi made us feel like family and had our best interest in mind throughout the entire process. My husband and I loved that Chadi had an artistic approach to our photos and found beauty in the simplest of moments. In addition to his outstanding photography, what set Chadi  apart was that he showed a genuine interest in making sure we got everything we were looking for and more. We never hesitate to recommended Chadi to all of our family and friends. Mansi Studios was by far one of the most pleasant vendors to work with both before and after our wedding day.

originalText.text:
I can’t even begin to find the words to describe our amazing experience with Chadi. Chadi worked with us on our wedding day for 12 hours from the early moments of the morning to the special sparks through the night.
Planning your own wedding is a very stressful experience and there will be a lot of details you might miss, Chadi will not miss any details and he will help you plan your wedding date, plus his main focus is to make sure that his bride is happy and comfortable all the time. At one point my vail slipped and Chadi immediately jumped in and adjusted it and pinned it back into my hair!
He has a personality that lifts everyone around him up and can make even the most camera shy enjoy their time and be excited to take part and be in the photos. From the simple aspect of fun to the livelihood of the up-beat energy you want on your wedding day, his flexibility and ability to organize a wedding timeline shows how greatly talented and incredibly responsible he is. Aside from being such a talented individual he is also very detail oriented, professional, friendly and works with you in any way you want him to. He is very precise in his work and delivers in a timely manner. We would highly recommend him to all our friends and would want to work with him again! You can tell he is very dedicated and passionate at what he does. Chadi has great vision and great timing when it comes to capturing the perfect moments. I got so many calls and messages the next day asking about him.
Thank you so much for our beautiful wedding photos. The emotion you’ve captured throughout is so raw and brilliant and the photos tell the story of our day perfectly. We will forever be grateful you were available to photograph our special day. We are so happy with them and have already looked through them probably 10 times already!
P.S. Future brides if you would like to forget about your stress, Chadi is the go-to person. Trust me if you do not hire Chadi you’re making a huge mistake! Your wedding day will miss his hat!

originalText.text: We were lucky enough to have Chadi photograph our engagement pictures and wedding pictures. He and his team captured the exact vibe of our wedding. We were in frequent communication with vision boards, and ideas for both days. We loved every photo we got back and were thrilled at how smoothly our wedding day went. All of our wedding guest and family were photographed beautifully and loved interacting with them. Trusting Mansi Studios with our wedding was one of the best decisions we made in the planning process.

text.text: We were lucky enough to have Chadi photograph our engagement pictures and wedding pictures. He and his team captured the exact vibe of our wedding. We were in frequent communication with vision boards, and ideas for both days. We loved every photo we got back and were thrilled at how smoothly our wedding day went. All of our wedding guest and family were photographed beautifully and loved interacting with them. Trusting Mansi Studios with our wedding was one of the best decisions we made in the planning process.

originalText.text:
My wife and I first met Chadi at my sister-in-law's wedding where he was the photographer. We were immediately impressed by how professional, approachable, and calm he was, especially amidst the chaos of missing bridesmaids and screaming children.

When it came time for our own wedding, we didn't hesitate at all to hire Chadi and he was one of the first vendors we booked. During the planning process, Chadi was communicative and asked us targeted questions about our venue, schedule, and desired shots. Day of, Chadi had a clear plan and creative vision but at the same time was clearly flexible and experienced to adapt to the inevitable wrenches that get thrown in the works.

Thanks for being a professional but also a refreshingly calm and creative human being, Chadi, we really appreciate you!
